stories.title: XMPP echo bot written in (mostly) sed

stories.text:
We all agree that Bitcoin is a waste of energy.

According to recent reports, Bitcoin comsumes the same amount of energy as Argentina.

Therefore, it would only take the combined processing power of a network of people greater than that of Argentina to corrupt the ledger and destroy the trust in the currency.

We have more combined processing power to finally make this achievable.

I agree that some people have invested in Bitcoin as a hedge against their country's failing currency.

But these people are in the minority, and a full-scale network attack on this technology is for the greater good of the planet as a whole.

So this is a call to arms. While Bitcoin is still vulnerable, who is prepared to attack it in a coordinated manner and undermine the technology of this space forever?

I believe this is the last opportunity we'll have.
